metadata.name: Powershell Store File In Alternate Data Stream
metadata.comment: Storing files in Alternate Data Stream (ADS) similar to Astaroth malware.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('start-process')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-filepath "$env:comspec" ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-argumentlist ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('>')))

output.summary: Storing files in Alternate Data Stream (ADS) similar to Astaroth malware.
